3740.title: Trust Vendor
3740.description:
TrustVendor is a hyperlocal fast-delivery platform that empowers small neighborhood stores to compete with large quick-commerce services like Swiggy Instamart, Zepto, and Blinkit. Unlike those platforms, which rely on centralized warehouses and exclude local shopkeepers, TrustVendor operates without godowns. Instead, it provides a digital storefront to any local vendor, enabling them to sell their products online and fulfill orders within 10‚Äì30 minutes in their area.

The platform allows customers to browse items from nearby stores, place orders, and receive fast delivery ‚Äî all while supporting local businesses. Vendors can sign up easily, manage inventory, and handle orders through a simple interface without any technical expertise. Payments are processed securely through UPI and cards, and deliveries are managed via store-based coordination or local delivery partners.

This project is my attempt to democratize access to quick-commerce infrastructure by giving real-world stores the same digital capabilities as corporate chains ‚Äî without needing to own a warehouse or a private delivery fleet. TrustVendor aims to make local commerce more competitive, efficient, and sustainable by using technology to level the playing field.

How to Play üéÆ

    Start the game by clicking the ‚ÄúStart Game‚Äù button.

    Move your starship with the mouse or touch input ‚Äî the ship follows your pointer with ease.

    Blast enemies as they descend and dodge incoming enemy fire.

    Collect power-ups to gain Rapid Fire, Shields, Health, or Multipliers ‚Äî each is active for a limited time.

    Keep your health up and your multiplier climbing to hit new high scores!

Why Cosmic Defender?
This game was designed to evoke the nostalgic intensity of classic arcade shooters like Space Invaders and Galaga, while using modern web technologies for rich visuals, intuitive control schemes, and feature-packed gameplay. Whether you want a quick 2-minute challenge or an extended session going for the top score, Cosmic Defender is tuned for maximum fun!

3860.title: Radian OS
3860.description:
RadianOS is not a traditional OS or a Linux distribution. It is a modular, architecture-agnostic operating system foundation and toolkit. This document outlines the requirements and design rules for a system to be considered Radian-compliant.

What Makes a System "Radian?"
A Radian system is an OS that conforms to a shared API, structure, and philosophy‚Äîallowing different systems to interoperate, share drivers, and be built using the oskit toolkit.

Radian promotes flexibility in implementation, while enforcing a consistent external contract.

3899.title: Just Thanks Exchange
3899.description:
JTExchange (aka Just Thanks Exchange, JTEx) is a cool, digital P2P conduct-points system that turns every kind act into tradeable campus credit‚Äîsend points to friends, stack points for perks, or just flex on the leaderboard.

GPT says "A lot of U.S. schools use PBIS‚Äîpoint-based rewards for positive behavior (aka conduct points)"
‚Äîso we‚Äôve simply taken that idea online and turned it into a peer-to-peer system.
Imagine when Rankings, XPs, Levels, and rewards appear in this points system. It‚Äôs not teachers scoring you, it‚Äôs friends recognizing you.

Features:
- Natural-language trading (thanks to LLMs)
- LLM-powered history summaries
- Campus posts (even with voting)

Tech Stack:
- Frontend: Vue 3 + Ant Design
- Backend: JavaScript + Express
- DB Compatibility: support Vercel SQL, DetaBase, or any sequelize.js supported database (including PostgreSQL)
- Deployment: My homeserver + Cloudflare

Notice:
- There are some things that have not been i8n yet
- Demo Links cannot reflect the latest program (a more stable version will be deployed)

The Presentation Foundation is a small SaaS app that helps distrubute Presentations, Handouts and more.

Just go to your-presentation.pr.djl.foundation and start your presentation in one click!
-- AD --
Ever get tired of distrobuting a Handout per airdrop to 30+ People? And that taking a lot of time?
Just tell your Students to visit your-lecture.pr.djl.foundation and open your handout in one click

---
I started this Project a few Months, it is (probably down again (sry working on the db)) in a functional condition, my goal is to implement:
- Organisations (with custom domain routing)
- Revamping my cross domain Routing system (hand coded)
- Getting is into a Sellable State

- Opening signups to more than just waitlist

4115.title: Venixxino
4115.description:
Venixxino is an educational web application designed to help visualize the electronic configurations of the first 20 elements of the periodic table. Using interactive 3D graphics powered by A-Frame, you can explore how electrons are arranged in shells around the nucleus for each element, making abstract chemistry concepts engaging and accessible.

## Features
- **Interactive 3D Atom Viewer:** Visualizes atoms with animated electron orbits and labeled nucleus, allowing users to explore atomic structures from any angle.
- **Complete Element Coverage:** Explore all elements from Hydrogen (1) to Calcium (20) with accurate electronic configurations.
- **Dynamic Electron Animations:** Watch as electrons smoothly transition when changing elements, with visually pleasing animations that illustrate how electron shells fill.
- **Educational Labels:** Displays the element's name, symbol, atomic number, neutron count, proton count, and electronic configuration directly in the 3D scene.
- **Customizable Environment:** Choose from 18 different immersive 3D environments including Forest, Moon, Egypt, Tron, and more.
- **Informative Fun Facts:** Reveals interesting facts about each element when selected, making learning more engaging.
- **Adjustable Electron Speed:** Control the animation speed of electrons for better visualization and understanding.
- **Intuitive Camera Controls:** Easily orbit, pan, and zoom to explore atoms from any perspective.
- **Interactive Sidebar:** Clean, collapsible interface that doesn't interfere with the visualization experience.
- **Educational Value:** Perfect teaching tool for chemistry students to understand electronic structure.
- **Kid-Friendly UI:** Simple controls and clear visuals make complex topics accessible to young learners.
4115.author: V Play Games
